articles.title: China Asks Banks to Report Exposure to Venezuela After US Raid - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: China’s top financial regulator asked its policy banks and other major lenders to report their lending exposure to Venezuela after the US ousted the South American country’s Beijing-friendly leader, according to people familiar with the matter.
